response.overview: 2am coffee is psychological thriller which talks about a man who is suffering from narcolepsy and eventually develops an addiction of caffeine which worsens his health. He struggles with cutting off coffee and gets struck in the  loop of temptation and urge and has to face the consequences of his own bad choices.
response.tagline: To sleep is to surrender, to wake is to die
response.title: 2AM COFFEE
